FuncDef: The display connectivity-test command displays results of PRBS test instances.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an index of a PRBS test instance on a specified interface.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 50.

Examples: Index Start time           Progress  Interval   Side  BER   LOS      ErrIns
<HUAWEI> display connectivity-test history interface serial 1/0/0/1:0 index 1
Start time           Side  Pattern  Phy-port   Total time (Interval*Round)
Total bits     Error bits     BER   LOS      Test progress
Round  Total bits   Error bits   BER   LOS     ES      EFS     SES     UAS
Start time           Type        BER   Duration  Insert in round
Start time           Interface          Phy-port   Interval   Side  Pattern
Info: Connectivity test on interface Serial0/1/0:0 is running :
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the result of the last PRBS test instance on a specified interface, run the display connectivity-test interface command. If the last test is not an enhanced PRBS test, the test result is displayed in the original way; if the last test is an enhanced PRBS test, the test result is displayed in detail.
To view summarized results of enhanced PRBS historical test instances on a specified interface, run the display connectivity-test history interface command.
To view detailed information about a specified enhanced PRBS historical test instance on a specified interface, run the display connectivity-test history interface index command.
If you do not view the result of a PRBS test immediately after the test is performed, run the display connectivity-test history command to view PRBS historical test instances on all interfaces. The command output shows the interface on which the PRBS test is performed, start and end dates as well as time, direction and code typ. As a device can store a maximum of 50 PRBS test instances, a maximum of 50 historical test records can be displayed.
